roleset.name: sell misleadingly or fraudulently
roleset.note: MISSELL-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from missell.01-v)
MISSELLING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, missell.01. No VNcls. (from misselling.01-n)

role.descr: grounds of deception under which arg1 is sold

example.name: with buyer as direct object, and arg5
example.text: The problem is , a lot of people are being convinced they-1 were mis-sold *-1 on the principle that PPI is an expensive , useless product that they did nt need .
example.arg: on the principle that the PPI is an expensive , useless product that they didn't need

example.name: Another buyer d.o., with oblique arg1
example.text: The firm or business then has 6 - 8 weeks to give you it's final written response as to whether it feels if it has mis-sold you the PPI or not .

example.name: args 0, 1 and 5
example.text: -LRB- and of course write to the government to get a refund on your car insurance as they 've mis-sold the requirement for it on legal grounds as you personally have never made a claim , therefore you should nt need it -RRB- ......
example.arg: as you personally have never made a claim, therefore you should nt need it

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Was looking for a little advise in regards to the possible mis-selling by a mortgage broker of a 100 % intrest only mortgage .
